code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GradientSelector=_ref=>{let{gradient,setGradient}=_ref;const getHelperText=()=>{if(gradient){return"Stamp will have a gradient.";}else{return"No gradient will be shown.";}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"selector-label-input-package",children:"Show Gradient?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group-package",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setGradient(true),className:gradient?"selected":"",children:"Yes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setGradient(false),className:!gradient?"selected":"",children:"No"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"helper-text-package-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"helper-text-package",children:getHelperText()})})]})]});};export default GradientSelector;
